processes.name: IT Strategy and Roadmap Planning
processes.description: Define the annual IT strategy aligned with business goals, including digital transformation roadmap, technology investment priorities, and innovation initiatives.

processes.name: Information Security Management
processes.description: Operate the enterprise information security management system (ISMS) including policy creation, risk assessments, vulnerability management, and security awareness training.

processes.name: Change Management and Release Control
processes.description: Manage all IT changes through a structured change advisory board (CAB) process including change requests, impact analysis, approval workflows, and post-implementation reviews.

processes.name: Incident and Problem Management
processes.description: Detect, triage, and resolve IT incidents within SLA targets. Conduct root cause analysis for recurring issues and maintain a known error database.

processes.name: Vendor and Third-Party Risk Management
processes.description: Evaluate, onboard, and monitor technology vendors and service providers. Conduct periodic risk assessments and SLA compliance reviews for third-party services.

processes.name: IT Budget and Cost Management
processes.description: Plan, allocate, and track IT expenditures including capital and operational costs. Perform TCO analysis and cost optimization reviews quarterly.

processes.name: Data Governance and Quality Management
processes.description: Define data ownership, classification, and quality standards. Monitor data quality metrics across payment transaction databases and ensure regulatory compliance for data handling.

processes.name: Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity
processes.description: Maintain and test disaster recovery plans for critical payment processing systems. Conduct annual BCP tabletop exercises and maintain RPO/RTO targets.

processes.name: Access Control and Identity Management
processes.description: Manage user access provisioning, de-provisioning, and periodic access reviews. Enforce least privilege, multi-factor authentication, and role-based access control.

processes.name: Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC)
processes.description: Manage the full software development lifecycle for payment platform features including requirements gathering, design, development, code review, testing, and deployment.

processes.name: IT Asset and Configuration Management
processes.description: Track and manage all IT assets (hardware, software, licenses) through their lifecycle. Maintain a CMDB with configuration baselines and dependency mapping.

processes.name: PCI-DSS Compliance Program
processes.description: Maintain compliance with Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard. Conduct quarterly vulnerability scans, annual penetration tests, and SAQ assessments.

processes.name: Performance Monitoring and Capacity Planning
processes.description: Monitor system performance metrics, application response times, and infrastructure capacity. Plan capacity upgrades based on transaction volume forecasts.

processes.name: IT Risk Assessment and Management
processes.description: Conduct periodic IT risk assessments, maintain the enterprise risk register, and track risk mitigation activities. Report risk posture to the board quarterly.

processes.name: Service Level Management
processes.description: Define, negotiate, and monitor service level agreements for internal and external IT services. Track SLA compliance and conduct periodic service reviews.

processes.name: IT Talent and Training Management
processes.description: Recruit, develop, and retain IT talent. Conduct skills gap analyses and provide technical training programs including security certifications.

processes.name: Enterprise Architecture Management
processes.description: Maintain the enterprise architecture blueprint covering applications, data, infrastructure, and integration layers. Ensure new solutions align with architectural standards.
